name: Kassadin
title: the Void Walker

P.name: Void Stone

effects.description: Innate: Kassadin is permanently ghosted and takes 10% reduced magic damage.

P.blurb: Innate: Kassadin is permanently  ghosted and takes reduced  magic damage.

Q.name: Null Sphere

effects.description: Active: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy that deals magic damage and disrupts their ongoing channels.
He also gains a shield that absorbs magic damage for 1.5 seconds.

Q.notes:
The  disrupt is 'wrapped' into a status effect that says the target is  Silenced for 0.25 seconds, but it does not actually silence. It however makes sure that the disrupt is prevented by  immunity to silences.
The shield is granted at the start of the cast time.
Q.blurb: Active:  Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  disrupts their ongoing  channels.

W.name: Nether Blade

effects.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal 20 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit.

Active: Kassadin empowers his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain 50 bonus range, deal increased bonus magic damage, and restore mana, with the restoration amount quintupled against champions.
Nether Blade resets Kassadin's basic attack timer.

W.notes:
The passive damage applies  proc damage and the active damage applies  spell damage.
The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal.
Nether Blade will not grant mana if the attack is  dodged or if it  misses, but will do so if the attack is  blocked. In all cases the damage is parried.
 Spell shield will block the active damage but not the passive one.
The passive bonus damage applies to structures.
The empowered attack will trigger but not be consumed nor apply its effects against structures.
W.blurb: Passive:  Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage.

E.name: Force Pulse

effects.description: Passive: Each time Kassadin or a nearby champion casts an ability, Force Pulse's current cooldown is reduced by 0.75 seconds.
Active: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them for 1 second.

E.notes:
Untargetable champions do not grant stacks upon ability activations.
Toggle abilities and transformation abilities do not count as ability activations and will not reduce Force Pulse's cooldown.
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.
E.blurb: Passive: Ability casts reduce the cooldown of this ability.

R.name: Riftwalk

effects.description: Active: Kassadin blinks toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. He then gains a stack of Riftwalk for 15 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 4 times.
Riftwalk: For each stack, Riftwalk deals bonus magic damage at an increased mana cost.
Riftwalk will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

R.notes: Flash can be used during the cast time, allowing Kassadin to blink further away.
R.blurb: Active: Kassadin  blinks toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. He then gains a stack of Riftwalk, stacking up to a cap.

lore: Cutting a burning swath through the darkest places of the world, Kassadin knows his days are numbered. A widely traveled Shuriman guide and adventurer, he had chosen to raise a family among the peaceful southern tribes—until the day his village was consumed by the Void. He vowed vengeance, combining a number of arcane artifacts and forbidden technologies for the struggle ahead. Finally, Kassadin set out for the wastelands of Icathia, ready to face any monstrous Void-construct in his search for their self-proclaimed prophet, Malzahar.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Cutting a burning swath through the darkest places of the world, Kassadin knows his days are numbered. A widely traveled Shuriman guide and adventurer, he had chosen to raise a family among the peaceful southern tribes—until the day his village was consumed by the Void. He vowed vengeance, combining a number of arcane artifacts and forbidden technologies for the struggle ahead. Finally, Kassadin set out for the wastelands of Icathia, ready to face any monstrous Void-construct in his search for their self-proclaimed prophet, Malzahar.

skins.name: Festival
skins.lore: Reigning from his frozen throne on a lonely mountain, Kassadin prepares in secret for a special festival hidden deep in the icy wastes. Whether it's a winter sports festival, none can say… except for the attendees, who think he's being ridiculous.

skins.name: Deep One
skins.lore: “Kassadin vanished at sea over fifty years ago. Whatever you saw down there—if you did see anything—it can't have been the same man I watched fall into the drink. And if it was… gods help us.”

skins.name: Harbinger
skins.lore: Kassadin swore vengeance on all gods, good and evil, of his world and of others, when his kingdom was destroyed by an errant thought. Forging armor from the remnants of an ancient living machine, he now sees himself growing closer towards the all-powerful beings he wishes to destroy.

skins.name: Cosmic Reaver
skins.lore: Born before the kindling of the stars, Kassadin stands alone in space's vast void. He watches over all things, a sentinel awaiting the end of this universe… and the beginning of the next.

skins.name: Count

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.lore: A grim, lonely man who lives on a grim, lonely street, Kassadin is the one whom all kids avoid on All Hallows' Eve; for in his presence, there are no treats nor sweets to be found.

skins.name: Hextech
skins.lore: Engrossed in his work to the point of near-obsession, Kassadin vanished for some time into the bowels of his labyrinthian workshop, disappearing from public life for years. When he emerged, he revealed a shocking hextech innovation to the world: his own body, fully integrated with the technology he so loved.

skins.name: Shockblade

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.lore: As high priest of the Shockblade order, Kassadin has a deep connection to the Storm few understand, but all respect. It is the power of his station that allows the Shockblades to follow their targets in and out of the spirit realm, going where no one else can to protect the people under their charge.

skins.name: Dragonmancer

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.lore: Kassadin scoured the world in search of a missing loved one. He mapped out a path in the stars, following a pattern of constellations only he could read—reaching an open field where the Astral Dragon recognized his purpose. Though his spirit darkens over the possibility his journey may never end, he now harnesses the dragon's brilliance to light his way.
